name: plaza-vea-app
description: Este es el repositorio para la demo de la app Plaza Vea.

scripts.run-android-complete-mac: cd www && npm install && bower install && cordova platform remove android ios && cordova platform add android ios && cd .. && cordova run android
scripts.run-ios-complete-mac: cd www && npm install && bower install && cordova platform remove android ios && cordova platform add android ios && cd .. && cordova run ios
scripts.run-web-complete-mac: cd www && npm install && bower install && grunt serve
scripts.build-android-complete-mac: cd www && npm install && bower install && cordova platform remove android ios && cordova platform add android ios && cd .. && cordova build android
scripts.build-ios-complete-mac: cd www && npm install && bower install && cordova platform remove android ios && cordova platform add android ios && cd .. && cordova build ios
scripts.run-android-complete-win: cd www & npm install & bower install & cordova platform remove android ios & cordova platform add android ios & cd .. & cordova run android
scripts.run-ios-complete-win: cd www & npm install & bower install & cordova platform remove android ios & cordova platform add android ios & cd .. & cordova run ios
scripts.run-web-complete-win: cd www & npm install & bower install & grunt serve
scripts.build-android-complete-win: cd www & npm install & bower install & cordova platform remove android ios & cordova platform add android ios & cd .. & cordova build android
scripts.build-ios-complete-win: cd www & npm install & bower install & cordova platform remove android ios & cordova platform add android ios & cd .. & cordova build ios
